title: I need help with downloading PBE(Mac)
body:
The PBE has the same file name as normal league of legends so whenever i try to open it it asks to replace, keep both or stop

I can't change the name either until its in a designated area

help?

replies.body: Try installing the PBE using our guide found [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204894140-Installing-the-PBE-Client) and let me know if you still run into this issue.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=oH3cFlT2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-20T21:58:25.182+0000)
>
> Try installing the PBE using our guide found [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204894140-Installing-the-PBE-Client) and let me know if you still run into this issue.

Tarpons Blade
I noticed that the PBE instructions for mac clearly show a LOL PBE with a file name LOL PBE
When i open mine the LOL PBE, contains a file named League of Legends
Thats my problem

If you drag the DMG into your applications folder, it should install the app and be named League of Legends PBE. Can you [snap a screenshot](https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT201361) and upload it to Imgur, then post the link here?

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=oH3cFlT2,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-21T17:20:25.671+0000)
>
> If you drag the DMG into your applications folder, it should install the app and be named League of Legends PBE. Can you [snap a screenshot](https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT201361) and upload it to Imgur, then post the link here?

http://imgur.com/a/xnhr1

just to repeat my problem, since my LOL NA is called League of Legends and so is LOL PBE i can't have them both

I checked this out on one of our Macbooks and this is actually an issue with the link on that page. You can grab a working installer from [here](http://l3cdn.riotgames.com/PBE/League%20of%20Legends%20PBE.dmg) instead. 

Thank you for bringing this to my attention so we can take care of that bad link. Let me know if that installer worked for you.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=oH3cFlT2,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-22T22:31:30.979+0000)
>
> I checked this out on one of our Macbooks and this is actually an issue with the link on that page. You can grab a working installer from [here](http://l3cdn.riotgames.com/PBE/League%20of%20Legends%20PBE.dmg) instead. 
> 
> Thank you for bringing this to my attention so we can take care of that bad link. Let me know if that installer worked for you.

No problem
NOW TIME TO PLAY THOSE SG SKINS
